personalInfo.name: Alex Taylor
personalInfo.title: Full-Stack Developer
personalInfo.summary: A passionate full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience in building scalable web applications and working with cross-functional teams in agile environments.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.thesisTitle: Optimizing Web Performance with Progressive Web Apps

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

responsibilities: Lead a team of 5 developers in designing and implementing new features for a high-traffic e-commerce website.
Architect and develop microservices using Node.js and deploy using Docker on AWS.
Conduct code reviews and mentor junior developers.
achievements: Successfully led the migration of legacy systems to modern microservices architecture.

responsibilities: Developed and maintained various web applications using React and Python.
Collaborated closely with UX/UI designers to implement user-friendly interfaces.
Automated deployment processes using Jenkins, resulting in a 50% reduction in deployment time.
achievements: Received the ‘Innovative Developer of the Year’ award in 2019.

projects.title: Personal Finance Tracker
projects.description: A personal finance management tool that allows users to track expenses and income, set budgets, and view financial reports. Developed using React for the frontend and Node.js for the backend. Features include user authentication, interactive charts, and automated expense categorization.

projects.title: Local Eats Finder
projects.description: A web application for discovering local restaurants and cafes. Users can search for eateries based on location, cuisine, and ratings. Implemented an interactive map using Google Maps API and integrated user reviews and ratings. Developed with Django and React.
